if(IsOneDashboardForAllGroups()) then ( elementobjectkey in ( select top 1 elementobjectkey from dashboardcontent where uid_dialogdashboarddef = ( select current uid_dialogdashboarddef from dashboarddef)) ) else
-- Iterate over all selected objects whose data have not been aggregated
elementobjectkey in ( select elementobjectkey from dashboardcontent where uid_dialogdashboarddef = ( select current uid_dialogdashboarddef from dashboarddef))
uid_dialogdashboarddef = ( select current uid_dialogdashboarddef from dashboarddef)

Label.Text: from dashboarddef select current title

if (select current elementValue from dashboardcontent<1 and select current elementValue from dashboardcontent>0) then ( numformat(select current elementValue from dashboardcontent, '0.00')) else (
select current elementValue from dashboardcontent)

HtmlAttribute.Name: 'style'
HtmlAttribute.Value: if( NOT from dashboardcontent select current HasHistoricValue ) then variable("color: %VI_Common_Color_Font%; right: .3em;") else format("{0} {1} ", if (from dashboardcontent select current ElementValue = from dashboardcontent select current ElementValueHistoric) then variable("color: %VI_Common_Color_Font%;") else if (from dashboardcontent select current ElementValue < from dashboardcontent select current ElementValueHistoric) then variable("color: %QBM_Primary_Green%;") else variable("color: %QBM_Primary_Red%;") , if( from dashboardcontent select current HasHistoricValue) then "right: 1.1em;" else "right: .3em;" )

Image.FileName: if (from dashboardcontent select current ElementValue = from dashboardcontent select current ElementValueHistoric) then variable("%permanentlink%dojoFile=qui/Actions/ic_actionForward_normal_20.png&effect=tint&color=") + substring(variable("%QBM_Primary_Blue%"),1) else if (from dashboardcontent select current ElementValue < from dashboardcontent select current ElementValueHistoric) then variable("%permanentlink%dojoFile=qui/Actions/ic_actionImport_normal_20.png&effect=tint&color=") + substring(variable("%QBM_Primary_Green%"),1) else variable("%permanentlink%dojoFile=qui/Actions/ic_actionExport_normal_20.png&effect=tint&color=") + substring(variable("%QBM_Primary_Red%"),1)

HtmlAttribute.Name: 'alt'
"data-neutral"
HtmlAttribute.Value: if (from dashboardcontent select current ElementValue = from dashboardcontent select current ElementValueHistoric) then "true" else "false"

HtmlAttribute.Name: "sliderPrio"
HtmlAttribute.Value:
if (from DashboardInfo select RedLimit < from dashboardcontent select current elementvalue) then
("2")
else
if (from DashboardInfo select GreenLimit >= from dashboardcontent select current elementvalue) then
("0")
else
("1")

HtmlAttribute.Name: "class"
HtmlAttribute.Value:
(if (isRed( from dashboardcontent select current convert( elementvalue, "decimal") )) then
"ChartStatusCritical"
else
if (isGreen(from dashboardcontent select current convert( elementvalue, "decimal"))) then
"ChartStatusOK"
else
"ChartStatusWarning") +
" ChartStatusBox"

HtmlAttribute.Name: "aria-label"
HtmlAttribute.Value:
if (isRed( from dashboardcontent select current convert( elementvalue, "decimal") )) then
translate("#LDS#The value is in the critical range")
else
if (isGreen(from dashboardcontent select current convert( elementvalue, "decimal"))) then
translate("#LDS#The value is in the uncritical range")
else
translate("#LDS#The value is in the middle range")

Column.Expression: select top 1 targetColor from DashboardContent where ElementNameDisplay = (select current ElementNameDisplay from DashboardSeries) and UID_DialogDashboardDef = (select current UID_DialogDashboardDef from DashboardSeries)

Column.Expression: select top 1 display() from referencedobjects where key = (select current elementobjectkey from dashboardobjects)

Column.Expression: select top 1 displaylong() from referencedobjects where key = (select current elementobjectkey from dashboardobjects)

Function.Name: warningThreshold()
errorThreshold()
isNegateThresholds()
Function.Comment: Gibt zurück, ob die Schwellwerte negiert sind. (siehe VI.DialogEngine.Statistic.SystemStatistic)

Function.Name: isRed(decimal val)
Function.Expression: if( isNegateThresholds()) then (val >= warningThreshold()) else (val >= errorThreshold())

Function.Name: isGreen(decimal val)
Function.Expression: if( isNegateThresholds()) then (val <= errorThreshold()) else (val <= warningThreshold())

Function.Name: percentage()
GetCurrentContentFilter()
Function.Expression: (elementobjectkey = ( select current elementobjectkey from dashboardobjects) and uid_dialogdashboarddef = (select current uid_dialogdashboarddef from dashboarddef))

Function.Name: GetCurrentElementColor()
Function.Expression:
isnullorempty( -- get defined color select current targetcolor from dashboardcontent,
-- if no defined color, pick color for index select top 1 color from colorscheme where key= (select current (iterationindex()%GetMaxGenericColorScheme()) from dashboardcontent))

Function.Name: GetMaxGenericColorScheme()
Function.Expression: select count() from colorscheme where match(key,'\d*') -- number of numeric entries in the table
Function.Comment: Gets number of entries in the color scheme for generic elements (those with a numeric key).

Function.Name: GetCurrentObjectColor()
Function.Expression: (from colorscheme select top 1 color where key=(select current (iterationindex() % getmaxgenericColorScheme() )from dashboardobjects))

Function.Name: GetFormattedDate()
Function.Expression: if(from dashboarddef select current (timescaleunit='Month')) then (select current FormatDate(elementdate, "MMM") from DashboardContent) else if(from dashboarddef select current (timescaleunit='Day')) then (select current FormatDate(elementdate, "special_monthday") from DashboardContent) else if(from dashboarddef select current (timescaleunit='Week')) then (select current FormatDate(elementdate, "special_monthday") from DashboardContent) else -- ??? select current FormatDate(elementdate, "special_monthday") from DashboardContent

Function.Name: GetCurrentElementColorSeries()
Function.Expression:
isnullorempty( -- get defined color select current targetcolor from DashboardSeries,
-- if no defined color, pick color for index select top 1 color from colorscheme where key= (select current (iterationindex()%GetMaxGenericColorScheme()) from DashboardSeries))

Function.Name: ChartWidthNarrow()
Function.Expression: if(AutoSize()) then 0 else if ((from dashboardinfo select current width) =0) then ( Convert(variable('%VI_Dashboard_ChartWidthNarrow%'),'System.Int32')) else (from dashboardinfo select current width)

Function.Name: ChartWidthWide()
Function.Expression: if(AutoSize()) then 0 else if ((from dashboardinfo select current width) =0) then ( Convert(variable('%VI_Dashboard_ChartWidthWide%'),'System.Int32')) else (from dashboardinfo select current width)

Function.Name: ChartTitle()
ChartInfoThresholdsSet()
Function.Expression: not(from DashboardInfo select current GreenLimit=0 and from DashboardInfo select current RedLimit=0)

Column.Name: TargetColor
Column.Expression: from colorscheme select top 1 color where key = (select current elementname from dashboardcontent)

Column.Name: ElementText
ElementTooltip
